about_the_game:
THE GREAT ELDER NEEDS YOU!

Play as a band of goofy looters and explore places together in search of the relics lost by the Great Old Ones. But be careful not to invoke them again!

COOP MULTIPLAYER GAME TO PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Explore mysterious places halfway between dream and reality, and make sure to take your share!

FIND AND COLLECT ANCESTRALS RELICS

Help Lord Morgaz'han regain his place among the Great Elders with the power of treasures. Take advantage of his collection of supernatural watches to gain new skills!

WILL YOU STILL BE FRIENDS IN THE END?

Show off your looter skills and don't lose anything along the way if you don't want to be the team's burden!

short_description: Cthuloot is a fun & spooky cooperative mutliplayer game where you'll join the best families of looters and search for mythical relics all around the world to please a mysterious Big Vilain. But beware of what lurks in the shadows and… in the other dimensions!
